message_1: A message "HELLO WORLD" is encrypted using 3 rails in Rail fence cipher. What is the resulting cipher text?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using a 3-rail Rail Fence cipher, we arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters row by row to get the encrypted message:

HOLEWLDLOR

So, the resulting cipher text is "HOLEWLDLOR".
